Detailed Description

A basic AI interface.

This class implements most the code an AI would need to interface with the lower-level game code. AIs should extend this class to get a lot of builer-plate code out of the way The provided AI class does just that.

Member Function Documentation

abstract void BaseAI.end ( ) [pure virtual]

This is run on after your last turn.

Implemented in AI.

abstract void BaseAI.init ( ) [pure virtual]

This is run on turn 1 before run

Implemented in AI.

abstract String BaseAI.password ( ) [pure virtual]

Make this your password, which should be provided.

Implemented in AI.

abstract bool BaseAI.run ( ) [pure virtual]

This is run every turn . Return true to end the turn, return false to request a status update from the server and then immediately rerun this function with the latest game status.

Implemented in AI.

abstract String BaseAI.username ( ) [pure virtual]

Make this your username, which should be provided.

Implemented in AI.
